title: Metro: Last Light [Mac] [Native]
description:
Well, something bad happened to the other download. People couldn't complete it.
Here is another version. Sorry for the time it took to fix it.

Language: English, Russian and maybe some more.

You can change language in game or you can go to MetroLL.app/Contents/Resources/User.cfg and change it to either lang_sound ru & lang_text ru or lang_sound us & lang_text us. Other language combinations could also work. Please forgive me for fucking up.
